channel.title: Approval of my sponsor?
channel.description:
I find this very unreliable, as you correctly said that it will be approved by a moderator within 24-48 hours it has been well past that (4 days, and still not a reply) and i can guarantee i wait a week and its still not approved, also i have a question:
I am willing to pay the minimum $30 as it's all i can afford to give for a sponser, and will i go on the sponser list straight after, or next month?

item.title: Approval of my sponsor?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Epic Mr Epic
item.description:
@Mr_Epic wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:10, topic:360210"][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=456646.msg3343105#msg3343105 date=1284580783]
$30 will not get you at sponsor spot, you will need at least 300+ since most of the severs up there blow out 300-400 a month on status.
[/quote]

It’s sad actually, people who borrow their parents credit cards and make a few grand off of players.

It’s quite smart though actually, it just shows you need to spend money to make money.[/quote]
Indeed, they just sneak into their mom’s room and take her purse looking for her credit card and she dont care, well I’m sorry, that kind of money could be used to rent a house, so I guess I was right he was gonna take my $30 and i won’t be on it, wanting me to spend more, money like that shouldn’t be wasted on a pixel game only if your an big ass company that doesn’t mess with other’s work Ah well I guess Mopar is making money a.ka. His irl job.
A suggestion: why won’t you make it so you can delete your own server, only if it’s been up for 2 days and is offline?

Read full topic

item.title: Approval of my sponsor?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:9, topic:360210”]$30 will not get you at sponsor spot, you will need at least 300+ since most of the severs up there blow out 300-400 a month on status.[/quote]Yea, I already said that

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

jmood128:

$30 will not get you at sponsor spot, you will need at least 300+ since most of the severs up there blow out 300-400 a month on status.

It’s sad actually, people who borrow their parents credit cards and make a few grand off of players.

It’s quite smart though actually, it just shows you need to spend money to make money.

item.title: Approval of my sponsor?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Epic Mr Epic
item.description:
@Mr_Epic wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:7, topic:360210”][quote author=Mr Epic link=topic=456646.msg3342176#msg3342176 date=1284487410]

And secondly, the minimum I’ve ever seen was about 100 dollars, 30 will never work.

So… money is money people may not be as spoiled as the others by their moms, i’m sure mopar won’t be so greedy and low-lifed to only accept $100+ as he clearly states that the cheapest is $30, if he wanted $100+ he would of said so meaning less people sponsoring and he loses profit,
well anyway that is only how much i can afford but I would be able to afford more if I gotten my sponser approved.

EDIT: Mopar, you said it would be approved within 24-48 hours, if not why lie? or you could at least give me a ruff amount of time it will be approved? thank you, oh and you might wanna add how long it will be on the sponsor list on your sticky topic (which is when tbh?).
[/quote]

Where did I say that?

Bidding runs from the 1st to the 10th every month, all applications will be approved by the 1st, we don’t approve them in between those times because there is no reason to.

I’m sick of getting PMs to approve applications, from now on if you PM me to approve your application, I will wait 1 full month to even look at it. Got it? Good.

So, as you can see, it will be approved before bidding starts again in about 16 days. There is no reason to approve anything before then[/quote]
Well thanks i didn’t know it would take 2 weeks, and say if I were to sponsor $30 would you just take it and not put me on sponsor list because your way of biding sounds like that to me? or will I be put on but I’d be randomized every time the page is reloaded or something? idk, can you explain please.

Read full topic

item.title: Approval of my sponsor?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Mr Epic, post:4, topic:360210”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=456646.msg3342114#msg3342114 date=1284480753]
And secondly, the minimum I’ve ever seen was about 100 dollars, 30 will never work.
[/quote]
So… money is money people may not be as spoiled as the others by their moms, i’m sure mopar won’t be so greedy and low-lifed to only accept $100+ as he clearly states that the cheapest is $30, if he wanted $100+ he would of said so meaning less people sponsoring and he loses profit,
well anyway that is only how much i can afford but I would be able to afford more if I gotten my sponser approved.

EDIT: Mopar, you said it would be approved within 24-48 hours, if not why lie? or you could at least give me a ruff amount of time it will be approved? thank you, oh and you might wanna add how long it will be on the sponsor list on your sticky topic (which is when tbh?).[/quote]

Where did I say that?

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:1, topic:349843”]Bidding runs from the 1st to the 10th every month, all applications will be approved by the 1st, we don’t approve them in between those times because there is no reason to.

I’m sick of getting PMs to approve applications, from now on if you PM me to approve your application, I will wait 1 full month to even look at it. Got it? Good.[/quote]

So, as you can see, it will be approved before bidding starts again in about 16 days. There is no reason to approve anything before then

Read full topic

item.title: Approval of my sponsor?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:5, topic:360210”]If i’m correct, there is not a set amount that you’ve to pay, so it isn’t that he will only accept 100$ +, it is a bidding process. For example, if a user bids a minimum of $100 and then another user comes along and he can’t beat the current minimum bid, then that user will not have their server on the sponsored server list unless he can raise the bid to over $100.[/quote]That’s why I said minimum

Read full topic

item.title: Approval of my sponsor?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

If i’m correct, there is not a set amount that you’ve to pay, so it isn’t that he will only accept 100$ +, it is a bidding process. For example, if a user bids a minimum of $100 and then another user comes along and he can’t beat the current minimum bid, then that user will not have their server on the sponsored server list unless he can raise the bid to over $100.

Read full topic
